Therefore, the federal government's wildfire command post is primarily operating in Boise, Idaho. Here is the information in the requested Markdown table format:

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| federal government's wildfire command post | Boise, Idaho | Yes |
